title: Kothikudhe Manasu Lyrics Sivappu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kothikudhe Manasu
Singer(s): Karthik
Movie: Sivappu
Music: N R Raghunandhan
Lyrics:

Kothikudhe manasu olayaa
enna mulusaa mulunditta alayaa.
indha ulagathil enakkku uravunu
sollikka oruthi kidachita nelayaa.
en usurayum unakku uyilaa ezhudhi
koduthadhu enna pilaiyaa?

Panangaattil uyir pochuda
nee thandhaai pudhu moochuda
naam marupadi ingae valanumnu
manasu thudikkudhada

Yaarumattra nerathula
nee iruppa dhoorathula.
pakkathula ulladhupol
pesikkuven thannaala.

Yegapatta aasapulla
yaarukitta naanum solla.
moodi vachi munagurendi
moodaavadhu saamathula.

Killi uchi maramthaandi
oru patchi ena thaediye
en manasukull vandhu
koodonnu katti kudithanam nadanthudhadi

Sondham thaedi odi vandha
indha nadhi unkarayil.
kattupattu ninidiche
kaaranamthaan thonala.

Indhu magaa samuthiramey
yaengudhadi unna thaanga.
eppadi naan vittuduven
en manasu ketkala.

Vannikaattu mannukkulla
aasayellaam podhachi vacha.
unna kanda pinnaalathaan thondi
edukkuren.

nee saaya en thozhudi
nee nadakka en kaaludi
nee marupadi ingae
kuzhandhaya maaridida
thaaren en usura...
